titleStmt.title: An Account of what passed at the execution of the late Duke of Monmouth on Wednesday the 15th of July, 1685, on Tower-Hill together with a paper signed by himself that morning in the Tower, in the presence of the Lords Bishops of Ely, and Bath and Wells, Dr. Tennison and Dr. Hooper : and also the copy of his letter to His Majesty after he was taken, dated at Ringwood in Hantshire, the 8th of July.
titleStmt.author: Monmouth, James Scott, Duke of, 1649-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Horne, John Baker and Benjamin Tooke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Ill.
